title: Fizz AA range nerfs should not go live.
body:
Or atleast adjusted to 150, 125 just makes no sense for him and makes him feel laggy on pbe because you have to literally walk inside ppl to hit them due to his small champ model.

Making champs feel like shit to play as shouldnt be the goal of nerfs, i get it that riot wants to reduce his power level and that is fine, but you dont need to make the champ feel bad to play at the same time, just tone down his numbers (like they are already doing by nerfing his E CD) and thats it.

Besides, the range nerf really hurts ap squishy fizz more than it does for tank fizz, just nerf his W passive %¨health damage base and increase the ap ratio if you want another change with the E nerf.

Maybe it isn't the right area to nerf, but auto-attack range _is_ a number.

I do feel that it is a good area to nerf though; it'll force him to move closer to cs (making it easier to harass him early on), make it generally easier to kite him in the (short) moments when his spells are on cd, and make it a little bit more dangerous for him to attack towers.
When he's actually assassinating someone, the attack range shouldn't have too big of an influence.
